content: **description ** when there s a power failure at your house does everyone go scrambling and digging thru drawers and closets searching for the flashlight well here is a pretty solution this attractive candle actually covers an empty can which very neatly holds a flashlight **yarn requirements ** acrylic 4-ply knitting weight yarn * 2 oz gold or color of choice for candlestick * 1-1/2 oz color of choice for candle * few yards yellow for flame **other requirements ** * size g hook * empty pringles can with lid * flashlight * yarn needle direct pdf link https //web archive org/web/20150306152713/http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/911candle pdf 1 formerly available here 2 1 http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/911candle pdf 2 http //web archive org/web/20070806132035/http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/911 html
